experiences.title: Vice President Of Technology
experiences.description:
SpeechDojo is a Non-Profit Organisation that promotes accessible public speaking through live instructor lead, weekly classroom programming and a free Online Learning Platform. I oversee the online division. Here are some cool things we did in the last year while growing our team to 35 high impact volunteers:
• Launched a TikTok account gaining over 2 million views and 23k followers
• Produced three Online Courses available on our website at speechdojo.org with 200+ sign-ups on our Beta
• Partnered with 12 schools (30 classrooms!) to run our Classrooms programming (Doubling each semester)
• Presented at HackTheNorth and began product development for a truly gamified learning platform
